original_title: Massacre: Recuerdos al futuro (en vivo en Obras!)
overview: On September 23, 2017, Massacre celebrated its 30 years of experience at the Obras Stadium. “Memories to the Future” leaves its indelible mark and immortalizes that devastating show, where the band reviewed their repertoire full of classics and rarities from all times.
title: Massacre: Recuerdos al futuro (en vivo en Obras!)
